statements: SELECT * FROM incidents ORDER BY incident_date ASC;
SELECT id, incident_description FROM incidents WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT incident_location FROM incidents WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE incident_location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT id, incident_date, compliance_status FROM incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT id, incident_description FROM incidents WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY incident_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE incident_location LIKE '%street%'
SELECT id, incident_date, incident_description FROM incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY incident_date ASC
SELECT id, incident_location, compliance_status FROM incidents WHERE incident_location != ''
SELECT id, incident_description, compliance_status FROM incidents WHERE compliance_status = FALSE ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM incidents;
SELECT description, incident_date FROM incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, description FROM incidents WHERE legal_compliance = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM progress_notes;
SELECT note, note_date FROM progress_notes ORDER BY note_date ASC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, description FROM incidents WHERE legal_compliance = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-05-01' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM progress_notes JOIN incidents ON progress_notes.incident_id = incidents.incident_id WHERE note_date >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY note_date ASC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, description FROM incidents WHERE description LIKE '%emergency%' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;

SELECT incident_id, COUNT(note_id) AS total_notes FROM incidents LEFT JOIN progress_notes ON incidents.incident_id = progress_notes.incident_id GROUP BY incident_id HAVING total_notes > 1 ORDER BY total_notes DESC;
SELECT * FROM Reporting_and_documentation_of_incidents;
SELECT incident_description, incident_date FROM Reporting_and_documentation_of_incidents;
SELECT * FROM Incidents ORDER BY incident_id DESC;
SELECT incident_type, incident_location FROM Incidents WHERE incident_status = 'Open';
SELECT note_content, note_date FROM Progress_notes ORDER BY note_date ASC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description, incident_date FROM Reporting_and_documentation_of_incidents;
SELECT * FROM Incidents WHERE incident_location='Office' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, incident_type, incident_location, incident_status FROM Incidents WHERE incident_status='Pending' AND incident_type='Accident';
SELECT * FROM Reporting_and_documentation_of_incidents r INNER JOIN Progress_notes p ON r.incident_id = p.incident_id WHERE p.note_content LIKE '%update%';
SELECT * FROM Progress_notes ORDER BY note_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_description, compliance_status FROM incidents WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT * FROM progress_notes WHERE note_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT note_description FROM progress_notes WHERE incident_id = 1001;
SELECT MAX(report_date) AS latest_report_date FROM reporting;
SELECT * FROM incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC, incident_description
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, compliance_status FROM incidents INNER JOIN reporting ON incidents.incident_id = reporting.incident_id WHERE incidents.compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_incidents, AVG(incident_id) AS avg_incident_id FROM incidents
SELECT * FROM progress_notes WHERE note_description LIKE '%progress%'
SELECT * FROM documentation ORDER BY doc_date ASC, doc_id DESC
SELECT * FROM Incidents;
SELECT incident_description, incident_date FROM Incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT note_text, note_author FROM ProgressNotes WHERE note_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM LegalDocuments WHERE document_type = 'Contract';
SELECT user_name, user_role FROM Users WHERE user_role = 'Admin' ORDER BY user_name;
SELECT incident_id, incident_description, incident_date, reported_by FROM Incidents;
SELECT note_id, note_text, note_date, note_author, incident_id FROM ProgressNotes;
SELECT document_id, document_type, document_description FROM LegalDocuments;
SELECT report_id, report_date, compliance_status, incident_id, document_id FROM ComplianceReports;
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_role FROM Users;
